description: B1 Stability Test Dataset - Synthetic v0 - NO expected_emotion (canon not frozen)
purpose: Test DETERMINISM and STABILITY of emotion analysis across iterations

samples.text: The sun rose slowly over the mountains, casting golden light across the valley.
She felt a deep sense of loss as she walked through the empty house.
The meeting was productive and everyone left feeling satisfied with the outcome.
I am absolutely furious about what happened yesterday at the office.
The child's laughter filled the room with pure joy and happiness.
He was terrified of what might happen next, his hands trembling.
Trust is built slowly over time through consistent actions and honesty.
The surprise party was a complete success and she was totally amazed.
Looking forward to the weekend, I am eager to start my new project.
The bitter disappointment lingered long after the announcement was made.
